title: COVID-19: Cricket will return but we must not hurry - Sportstar

content:
December 2019 seems such a fresh memory in the wake of recent 2019 novel coronavirus (SARS-CoV-2) pandemic, which was first reported in Wuhan, China. 
For several health care workers including doctors and nurses, sports has often been a cathartic phenomenon.… [+3438 chars]
